title: `cast run --debug` sometimes fails compiling contracts with a "source not found" error
body:
### Component

Cast

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

cast 0.2.0 (2e18681 2023-06-26T00:15:26.624789000Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

cast run --debug 

### Operating System

macOS (Apple Silicon)

### Describe the bug

Two examples:

```
❯ cast run --debug 0xb7e392ae697b47a16b03bd5cdadbbbd200f6e9d05d56dd26fc05897769e1772b
Executing previous transactions from the block.
Compiling: Seaport 0x00000000000001ad428e4906ae43d8f9852d0dd6
Error: 
Failed to compile contract Seaport from 0x00000000000001ad428e4906ae43d8f9852d0dd6

Context:
- Compiler run failed:
Error (6275): Source "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC1155.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpUlswc3".
 --> Seaport/contracts/test/TestERC1155.sol:4:1:
  |
4 | import { ERC1155 } from "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC1155.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpUlswc3".
 --> Seaport/contracts/test/TestERC20.sol:4:1:
  |
4 | import { ERC20 } from "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpUlswc3".
 --> Seaport/contracts/test/TestERC20NotOk.sol:4:1:
  |
4 | import { ERC20 } from "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpUlswc3".
 --> Seaport/contracts/test/TestERC20Panic.sol:4:1:
  |
4 | import { ERC20 } from "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpUlswc3".
 --> Seaport/contracts/test/TestERC20Revert.sol:4:1:
  |
4 | import { ERC20 } from "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC721.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpUlswc3".
 --> Seaport/contracts/test/TestERC721.sol:4:1:
  |
4 | import { ERC721 } from "@rari-capital/solmate/src/tokens/ERC721.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

and

```
❯ cast run 0x59e1e37d1c9a1f33781cfd2840278f40a336e1073c20108c93150ca5cc0f4f1f --debug
Executing previous transactions from the block.
Compiling: Seaport 0x00000000000000adc04c56bf30ac9d3c0aaf14dc
Compiling: OperatorFilterRegistry 0x000000000000aaeb6d7670e522a718067333cd4e
Compiling: PayableProxy 0x0000a26b00c1f0df003000390027140000faa719
Compiling: Conduit 0x1e0049783f008a0085193e00003d00cd54003c71
Compiling: Bueno721Drop 0x6e2a39d530c32b6b98a57dbc835b63d75947c154
Compiling: Bueno721Drop 0xec2a72e9a1f420db89c902fa70f42e46966ca498
Error: 
Failed to compile contract Bueno721Drop from 0x6e2a39d530c32b6b98a57dbc835b63d75947c154

Context:
- Compiler run failed:
Error (6275): Source "erc721a-upgradeable/contracts/extensions/ERC721AQueryableUpgradeable.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpndfhXV".
 --> Bueno721Drop/contracts/Bueno721Drop.sol:4:1:
  |
4 | import "erc721a-upgradeable/contracts/extensions/ERC721AQueryableUpgradeable.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "operator-filter-registry/src/upgradeable/OperatorFiltererUpgradeable.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/private/var/folders/td/psnn1nld3zbf_wzt1g1bpw440000gp/T/.tmpndfhXV".
 --> Bueno721Drop/contracts/Bueno721Drop.sol:9:1:
  |
9 | import "operator-filter-registry/src/upgradeable/OperatorFiltererUpgradeable.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```
